name: Technicolor
goal:
Technicolor, a worldwide technology leader in the media and entertainment sector, is at the forefront of digital innovation. We lead the market in delivering advanced video services to content creators and distributors. Our commitment: supporting the delivery of exciting new experiences for consumers in theaters and homes.
Technicolor activities are:
- Production services: films services, film animation, visual and special effects for feature film, TV and advertising, virtual and augmented reality services, postproduction;
- DVD services : DVD and Bluraydisc replication and distribution;
- Connected home: television set top box and residential gateways for satelite and cable television operators and for telecommunication broadband services operators.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- droit d'auteur et copyright
- protection des données
- média convergents, services media audiovisuels, politique audiovisuelle- propriété intellectuelle: brevet unitaire et système juridictionnel
- fiscalité propriété intellectuelle
- concurrence et standardisation
- fréquences
- efficacité énergétique
- environnement (chemicals, waste,...)
- changement climatique
- politique commerciale
- programme cadre de recherche et développement
